repository.description: Repository information related to the collaborator

avatar_url.description: URL of the collaborator's avatar image

url.description: URL of the collaborator's GitHub API endpoint

html_url.description: HTML URL of the collaborator's profile

followers_url.description: URL of the followers of the collaborator

following_url.description: URL of the users followed by the collaborator

gists_url.description: URL of gists created by the collaborator

starred_url.description: URL of the repositories starred by the collaborator

subscriptions_url.description: URL of the repositories subscribed to by the collaborator

organizations_url.description: URL of organizations the collaborator is associated with

repos_url.description: URL of the repositories of the collaborator

events_url.description: URL of the events related to the collaborator

received_events_url.description: URL of events received by the collaborator

site_admin.description: Indicates if the collaborator is a site administrator

permissions.description: The permissions assigned to the collaborators

admin.description: Indicates if the collaborator has admin access

maintain.description: Indicates if the collaborator has maintain access

push.description: Indicates if the collaborator has push access

pull.description: Indicates if the collaborator has pull access

triage.description: Indicates if the collaborator has triage access
